Description: Welcome to 10 Brooks Street #8, a delightful 3-bedroom, 1-bathroom apartment that offers a comfortable and inviting living space. This rental gem boasts a range of desirable features, including hardwood floors, central air conditioning, and a stunning kitchen. Situated in a convenient location, this apartment is perfect for individuals or families seeking a cozy home. Central air conditioning ensures that you'll stay cool and comfortable throughout the year, no matter the weather outside. It provides a welcome respite during hot summer days and cozy warmth during chilly winter evenings. Located in a desirable neighborhood, 108 Brooks Street #8 offers the convenience of nearby amenities, such as restaurants, shops, and parks. Commuting is a breeze with easy access to public transportation and major roadways.
